Cypro-Minoan â‰ˆ 1550â€“1050 BC undeCyphered (UTF since 2021)

U+12F9x ğ’¾ ğ’¾‘ ğ’¾’ ğ’¾“ ğ’¾” ğ’¾• ğ’¾– ğ’¾— ğ’¾˜ ğ’¾™ ğ’¾š ğ’¾› ğ’¾œ ğ’¾ ğ’¾ ğ’¾Ÿ U+12FAx ğ’¾  ğ’¾¡ ğ’¾¢ ğ’¾£ ğ’¾¤ ğ’¾¥ ğ’¾¦ ğ’¾§ ğ’¾¨ ğ’¾© ğ’¾ª ğ’¾« ğ’¾¬ ğ’¾­ ğ’¾® ğ’¾¯ U+12FBx ğ’¾° ğ’¾± ğ’¾² ğ’¾³ ğ’¾´ ğ’¾µ ğ’¾¶ ğ’¾· ğ’¾¸ ğ’¾¹ ğ’¾º ğ’¾» ğ’¾¼ ğ’¾½ ğ’¾¾ ğ’¾¿ U+12FCx ğ’¿€ ğ’¿ ğ’¿‚ ğ’¿ƒ ğ’¿„ ğ’¿… ğ’¿† ğ’¿‡ ğ’¿ˆ ğ’¿‰ ğ’¿Š ğ’¿‹ ğ’¿Œ ğ’¿ ğ’¿ ğ’¿ U+12FDx ğ’¿ ğ’¿‘ ğ’¿’ ğ’¿“ ğ’¿” ğ’¿• ğ’¿– ğ’¿— ğ’¿˜ ğ’¿™ ğ’¿š ğ’¿› ğ’¿œ ğ’¿ ğ’¿ ğ’¿Ÿ U+12FEx ğ’¿  ğ’¿¡ ğ’¿¢ ğ’¿£ ğ’¿¤ ğ’¿¥ ğ’¿¦ ğ’¿§ ğ’¿¨ ğ’¿© ğ’¿ª ğ’¿« ğ’¿¬ ğ’¿­ ğ’¿® ğ’¿¯ U+12FFx ğ’¿° ğ’¿± ğ’¿²

Unlike many other neighboring states, the Late Bronze Age collapse had only a slight impact on Bronze Age Cyprus; in fact, the island culture flourished in the period immediately following the dramatic events of the collapse, and there was a visible increase in the use of the script in such centers as Enkomi. On the other hand, as a direct result of this collapse, the script ceased to exist in Ugarit, along with Ugarit itself.

Suggested Syllabary KF-2023 based on similar forms:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cypro-Minoan_syllabary#/media/File:Cyprominoansyllabaryconsensus.png

Entries with â€¢ are very tenuous additions by the author (pannous) Entries with â€¢ are suggestion by the author (pannous) Entries may omit the â€¢ if they seem well supported, like ğ’¿¬ â‰ˆ ğ ” ma, ğ’¿® â‰ˆ ğ • me, ğ’¾¯ â‰ˆ ğ ˜ mu

Since (later) Cypriotic is a pure Syllabary without any logographs, we can make assumptions about unmatched signs either belonging to a xenotic series ( x / z ) or being Orthographic variants:

Linear CY Cypriotic Syllabary

Cypriotic 9th BC - 300 BC < Cypro-Minoan 1500 BC â‡” Linear-A !
A- ğ € A ğ  E ğ ‚ I ğ ƒ O ğ „ UÊ·
d- ğ ­ da ğ ® de ğ ¯ di ğ ° do ğ ± du
j- ğ … ja ğ † ğ ˆ ju
k- ğ Š ka ğ ‹ ke ğ Œ ki ğ  ko ğ  ku
m- ğ ” ma ğ • me ğ – mi ğ — mo ğ ˜ mu
n- ğ ™ na ğ š ne ğ › ni ğ œ no ğ  nu
p- ğ  pa ğ Ÿ pe ğ   pi ğ ¡ po ğ ¢ pu
ks- ğ · qa ğ ¸ qe
r- ğ £ ra ğ ¤ re ğ ¥ ri ğ ¦ ro ğ § ru
l- ğ  la ğ  le ğ ‘ li ğ ’ lo ğ “ lu
s- ğ ¨ sa ğ © se ğ ª si ğ « so ğ ¬ su
t- ğ ­ ta ğ ® te ğ ¯ ti ğ ° to ğ ± tu
w- ğ ² wa ğ ³ we ğ ´ wi ğ µ wo
z- ğ ¼ za ğ ¿ zo
th- see d- = t-
g- see k- = kh-
